title: Hello World example for a running logaaa

executable.script:
#!/bin/bash

echo "using workflow: $JS7_WORKFLOW_NAME"
echo "running job: $JS7_JOB_NAME"

for ((i=1; i<=115; i++)); do
   echo "Hello World no. $i"
   sleep 1
done

#!/bin/bash

echo "using workflow: $JS7_WORKFLOW_NAME"
echo "running job: $JS7_JOB_NAME"

for ((i=1; i<=25; i++)); do
   echo "Hello World no. $i"
   sleep 1
done
